content: the winter garden cowls pattern uses simple stitches and chunky yarn to create a beautiful textured cowl in 3 sizes small cowl 11 5cm/4 5 high by 40cm/16 around medium cowl 25cm/9 75 high by 52cm/20 5 around large cowl 37cm/14 75 high by 65cm/25 5 around skills needed are a cast on knitting in the round the knit stitch yarn forward pass stitch over and a cast off the pattern is written in a line by line format and the cowls are knit in the round from the bottom up the pattern repeat is 2 stitches and 4 row and with a bit of maths the pattern is easily adapted to other yarn weights i am not a pattern designer i simply enjoy playing around with stitches and seeing what happens if you spot a mistake or have a question please send me a message now for the the boring bit with respect please do not take credit for the pattern claim the pattern as your own or sell the pattern selling completed cowls is fine but not the pattern or any part of the pattern if you sell the cowls online please link back to me for pattern credit by using this pattern you are agreeing to my terms thank-you and happy knitting
